actions.message:
**「Level System」**
ー${serverVars("member")} reached level ${serverVars("myLevel")}.
ーNext level in ${serverVars("myLevel") * 5} experience.
ーRewarded ${tempVars("RewardCredit")} Cash for leveling.
actions.name: Send Message

actions.message:
💰** All Cash Controls **💰

*Cashboard (1-20) - Brings up a leaderboard of Most Cash On hand
*deposit (Amount) - Deposit Cash Into Your Bank
*withdraw (Amount) - Withdraw Cash From Your Bank
*Transfer (@User) (AmounWt) - Transfer Cash To Another Player
*Gamble (300+) - Gamble And Try To Win
*Thief (@User) - Steal From Another Player Must Spend 10k To Thief
*Work - Can Do Done Every 2 Hours For Cash
*Cash - Brings up Bank & Cash Amounts
*Casino (Amount) - Take Your Chance At The Slot Machine

**__Jackpots will be given out periodically so be sure to check__**

Run Script

actions.message:
${member} Here is the info u requested
```
Bounties 

Updated the bounties page to include all wanted bounties, not just those of a higher wanted level.
You can now place bounties on players via the terminal command bounty.
Placing a bounty by username will increase their wanted level by 2, and if not currently wanted, won't reveal their ip.
Placing a bounty by IP will increase their wanted level by 5, and will reveal their ip to those bounty hunting.
You can place a bounty for 200 BTC.
Limits have been put into place to reduce abuse.
A player can place a bounty once per day.
A Target can have a bounty placed on them once per day.
With this max cap, and the daily bounty decay, it makes it so that it would take several days for your ip to actually be revealed (And if you recall last blog post, IPs are no longer tracked on reset)
DDOSing the same target (IP not Username) within 2 hours no longer increases your bounty level each hit. Instead, only 1 bounty gets placed on your first hit.
A secret RCE task allows you to reduce your bounty level upon successful completion. Be on the lookout for it ```

actions.message:
Slavehack 2 Terminal Commands


Basics
``` 
help - Show this help file
test - Test the terminal
connect - Make a connection
convert - Convert C-Mods to Legendary C-Mods
logs - Manage local/remote logs
slaves - Manage slaves
jobs - List processes
kill - Kill a process
alias - Manage terminal aliases
history - Print terminal history
clear - Clear terminal scrollback or terminal history
exit - Exit a connection
account - Manage bank accounts while logged into a bank
meme - Allows meme creation
mine - Collects income from NPCs/VPCs
scan - Scan an NPC for c-mods and compilers
teddy - Create fun viruses
tutorial - Runs the tutorial bot
video - Create video software
where - Lookup NPC IP Address by name
whois - Lookup information on an IP Address
version - Prints terminal version number and date of last release
```

File Management
```
ls - List files
rm - Delete a file
rmid - Delete a file by id
rmlist - Delete mutliple local files by type
install - Install a file
installid - Install a file by id
touch - Create a text file
cat - Print the contents of a text file
av  - Run a malware scan
download - Download files by name from a target
downloadid - Download files by id from a target
format - Format and clear various parts of your game such as files, slaves, logs
nas - Manage your external storage device
recovery - Recover the default files
```
Hacking
```
pulse - Sniff a password
drill - Allows you to crack a bank account password
connect - Make a connection
ddos - Perform a DDoS
install - Install a file
addlog - Create fake log entries
bounce - Reroute your connection
make - Allows virus creation
notify - Send a message to a connected target
upload - Upload files by name to a target
uploadid  Upload files by id to a targe
```

Use <command> -help for more information on a specific command.
actions.name: Send Message

actions.message: ${member} - A list of commands has been sent to your inbox please check it out
actions.name: Send Message

actions.message:
**Slavehack 2 Chat Commands**

**Text commands**
```
/fakewhisper- Makes text look like a whisper but everyone can see it.
/up - Scrolls text Up.
/down - Scrolls text Down.
/left - Scrolls text Left.
/right - Scrolls text Right
/sup - Scrolls text Up then Stops.
/sdown - Scrolls text Down then Stops.
/sleft - Scrolls text Left then Stops.
/sright - Scrolls text Right then Stops.
/bup - Scrolls text Up then it bounces back and forth.
/bdown - Scrolls text Down then it bounces back and forth.
/bleft - Scrolls text Left then it bounces back and forth.
/bright - Scrolls text right then it bounces back and forth.
/huge - Makes text "huge".
/spoiler - Hides text behind a spoiler tag.
/shrug - Displays "¯\_(ツ)_/¯"
/magic - Bold text
/magbow - Rainbow text
/leet - 1337 text
/huge- Makes text bigger than normal.
/gigantic- Makes text bigger than huge.
/massive- The biggest text you can make.
/small- Makes text small.
/ittybitty- Makes text smaller than small.
/hardtoread- Makes text look like a tiny unreadable line.
/reverse- Reverses string of text.
/red- Changes text red color.
/green- Changes text green color.
/blue- Changes text blue color.
/w @name <message> - Send a whisper message in game chat.
/encrypt- Encodes your text.
/decrypt- Decodes your text.
/selfderotate - Self destruct and rotate 
/lrotate - rotate to the left
/rrotate - rotate to the right
/train - Scrolls an ascii train from the right side to left side

To edit your last line in chat press "UP" arrow on keyboard.
You can use a backtick to make a box around your text by putting 1 in front of your text and 1 after.

```
actions.name: Send Message

actions.message:
**Chat Games**
```
/me- Displays " **Your name** " and the text entered.
/gamble off - Toggle gamble bot off
/gamble on - Toggle gamble bot on
/dice - Roll and see if you win ALL the Schmeckles!
/slots - Bet rep playing slots and see if you win.(Good way to lose a lot of rep...I lost 6mil.)
/poker - Bet rep playing poker and see if you win.(Even better way to lose rep.)
/cmods - New way to lose C-mods.(Don't waste your cmods or time.)
/8ball- Pretty standard Magic 8-Ball```
actions.name: Send Message

actions.message:
**Other Commands**
```
/played- Posts you total seconds played into the chat.
/ip - [THIS WILL OUTPUT YOUR IP TO CHAT FOR EVERYONE TO SEE!! BEWARE!!!]
/Help - Displays a link to the Official Help Page

-You can now Drag N' Drop files into the in-game chat.
-Pasting BTC packs into the chat will show if it is still active or not.(If you see an active code in chat quickly copy and paste it into the paccode consume box in the finance window and click consume.)
/fakepac <number> - Creates a fake paccode in the chat.
```

actions.message:
```
**Rules Of The Demonic Mafia**

• Treat others how you wish to be treated, so be kind and courteous. Respect everyone regardless of gender, ethics and age. Do not harass other members or insult the community and what it stands for as a whole.

• CURSING IS OKAY. But never make racists, derogatory, and threatening comments towards others here, we are all here because we share a common bond.

• Do not advertise your server or any other kind of advertising without permission, this will result in 1st time: a warning and deletion of the message, 2nd time: merciless ban.

• Please remember there will be minors in here so sensitive topics and expressions may be seen as offensive.

• No personal information, addresses, phone numbers.

• ENGLISH ONLY

• No Begging for handouts or carries. If we can help we will. Do not beg.


More Rules To Follow As Time Goes On```
actions.name: Send Message

actions.message:
***Welcome to the Demonic Mafia Command Section***

🔳 - Main page
⚙ - Basic User Commands
📷 - Fun & Games
✨ - Slavehack Specific
🔨 - Admin/Moderation
 
**For navigating thru bot commands use the reactions below.**
actions.name: Send Message

actions.message:
***Welcome to the Demonic Mafia Command Section***

🔳 - Main page
⚙ - Basic User Commands
📷 - Fun & Games
✨ - Slavehack Specific
🔨 - Admin/Moderation
 
**For navigating thru bot commands use the reactions below.**
actions.name: Edit Message

actions.message:
**⚙ - Basic User Commands**

*Timezones - Lists current time in multiple timezones
*Help - Bring up help section
*Rules - Lists Current Rules For The Demonic Mafia
*Reminder (mins) (remindinfo) - Set a reminder for yourself
*Timer (secs) - Sets a timer
*User-info (@user) -Brings up info on a user
*Serverinfo - Brings up current info on server
*Botinfo - Bring Up Info On The Bot

**__For navigating thru bot commands use the reactions below.__**
actions.name: Edit Message

actions.message:
**📷 - Fun & Games**
*pepe
*Say (@user) - Send Msg as user
*Nuke - Nuke The server
*hack (@user)
*kill (@user)
*jail (@user)
*wanted (@user)
*8ball (question)
*CashHelp - Brings up help menu for Cash Control

**__For navigating thru bot commands use the reactions below.__**
actions.name: Edit Message

actions.message:
**✨ - Slavehack Specific Commands**

*Npcs - List of all npcs from highests cpu to lowest
*Clans - Lists Current Clans In Slavehack 2
*Targets - Lists Current Targets Of Clan
*Shchat - Shows a list of commands to use Sh2 chat
*Terminal - Most SH2 terminal Commands

**__For navigating thru bot commands use the reactions below.__**
actions.name: Edit Message

actions.message:
**🔨 - Administrator/Moderation**

*Poll (whats your poll for )
*Templock - Create a templodown on a channel
*Unlock - Unlocks channel from a templock
*Serverlockdown - Lock Down A Server and create a safe room
*Serverunlock - Unlock Server from a lockdown
*Gcreate - Create A Giveaway
*classified - Send a that is classified image
*Announce (#channel) - Send a announcement to a specific channel
*jackpot <Prize Amount> <Entrance Cost> <Max Players to end>
*blockgamble (@user)
*unblockgamble (@user)


**__For navigating thru bot commands use the reactions below.__**
